Uses of Package
com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport

  • Packages that use com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter
    Contains an interface whose methods can be called by an external data subset creation service or an external data subset locator to retrieve data from an external data source.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider.
    com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice
    The standard i2 Analyze network search service provides clients with the ability to perform network searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport
    Contains classes for the services that perform network searches for items in the Analysis Repository and external data sources.
  • Classes in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport used by com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter 
    Class and Description
    NetworkSearchNodeList
    Contains the NetworkSearchNodes that define the criteria and structure that the Items returned by a network search must match.
  • Classes in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport used by com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice 
    Class and Description
    NetworkSearchNodeList
    Contains the NetworkSearchNodes that define the criteria and structure that the Items returned by a network search must match.
  • Classes in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport used by com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice 
    Class and Description
    NetworkSearchNodeList
    Contains the NetworkSearchNodes that define the criteria and structure that the Items returned by a network search must match.
  • Classes in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport used by com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice 
    Class and Description
    NetworkSearchNodeList
    Contains the NetworkSearchNodes that define the criteria and structure that the Items returned by a network search must match.
  • Classes in com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport used by com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport 
    Class and Description
    ItemCountCondition
    A condition on a NetworkSearchNode that means a network of Items only matches a search if the number of Items at that position in the network meets the condition.
    ItemCountOperator
    Indicates the comparison that is performed when an ItemCountCondition is evaluated for a NetworkSearchNode.
    NetworkSearchNode
    A generic representation for EntityNetworkSearchNodes and LinkNetworkSearchNodes that provides the features that are common to both.
